alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 2:42PM EDT until July 03 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 241 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dulah, or 14 miles north of Little River, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Shallotte, Bethel, Makatoka, Freeland, Honey Island, Nakina, Old Dock, Mollie, Exum, Bughill, Longwood, Pireway, Ash, Dulah and Crusoe Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
